name: Yogurt Whole Wheat Quick Bread
author: lenihan5
summary: This started out as muffins but I found that it can be baked as bread too. The lemon juice gives it a nice bite and the whole wheat bread gives it a great nutty flavor.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan
In a large bowl, combine melted butter and honey
Whisk in yogurt, egg and lemon juice
In a separate bowl, sift together all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda, nutmeg and cinnamon
Fold this mixture into the yogurt mixture, stirring just enough to blend
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan
Bake in preheated oven until top of loaf springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean, about 50 minutes
